text: KLCR (95.3 FM, using the trademark "Lake County Radio") is a radio station broadcasting an adult contemporary music format. Licensed to Lakeview, Oregon, United States, the station is currently owned by Woodrow Michael Warren. ==References== ==External links== LCR Category:Lakeview, Oregon Category:Radio stations established in 1975 Category:1975 establishments in Oregon
title: KLCR
